trans-unit.source: Scales an object in the three-dimensional x-y-z plane, starting from a defined center point.
Scale factors are defined in x-, y-, and z- directions from this center point.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>.
Vector3D along which the transformation scales.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>.
Vector3D along which the transformation scales.
Center around which the transformation scales.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified scale factors.
Factor by which to scale the X value.
Factor by which to scale the Y value.
Factor by which to scale the Z value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified center coordinates and scale factors.
Factor by which to scale the X value.
Factor by which to scale the Y value.
Factor by which to scale the Z value.
X coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
Y coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
Z coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the transform's center point.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The x-coordinate of the transform's center point.
The default value is `0`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterX*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The y-coordinate of the transform's center point.
The default value is `0`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterY*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
The default value is `0`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterZ*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets the scale factor in the x-direction.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Scale factor in the x-direction.
The default value is `1`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleX*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the scale factor in the y-direction.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Scale factor in the y-direction.
The default value is `1`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleY*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the scale factor in the z-direction.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Scale factor in the z-direction.
The default value is `1`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleZ*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> representation of this transformation.
<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> representation of this transformation.
